ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating complex and detailed SVGs from multimodal inputs using pre-trained Vision-Language Models.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ End-to-end multimodal SVG generation â€¢ Leverages pre-trained Vision-Language Models (VLMs) â€¢ Generates complex and detailed SVGs from simple icons to intricate anime characters â€¢ Parameterizes SVG commands and coordinates into discrete tokens
ðŸ“– Summary: OmniSVG is a novel framework for generating SVGs using Vision-Language Models. It parameterizes SVG commands into discrete tokens, enabling the creation of complex SVGs from various inputs. The project also introduces MMSVG-2M, a large multimodal SVG dataset, and establishes a standardized evaluation protocol for conditional SVG generation.
